++ Git HEAD

+++ SUMMARY


  * Pointer to last GitCommit in current working GitBranch:
  
  * pointer to the current branch reference
    * Branch reference = pointer to the last GitCommit in the currently checked-out 
      GitBranch
      
  * Special Case: GitDetatchedHEAD
